author: ETMarkets.com
title: Stocks Surged: Sensex rises! These stocks are up over 10% on BSE - The Economic Times
text: NEW DELHI: Quite a few stocks rose in excess of 10% on BSE as domestic equity indices, BSE Sensex and NSE Nifty, traded in the on Friday amid in frontline bluechip counters. Stocks that rallied over 10% included, Nureca Ltd(12.49%) and Gallops Enterprise(11.01%). The 30-share Sensex traded 102.08 points up at 77722.29, while the 50-share Nifty index rose 11.55 points to 23538.05. In the Nifty 50 index, 19 stocks traded in the green, while 31 stocks were in the red. Stocks such as Atlas Cycles, Parsharti Invst, DJS Stock & Shares Ltd., Power & Instrument and United Leasing hit their fresh 52-week high, while GTPL Hathway, Tata Elxsi, Pritish Nandy, Universal Autofoundry and Jai Corp touched their new 52-week low in trade.
